mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM pj_notice_tbl
mapper.update: UPDATE pj_notice_tbl SET notice_readCnt = notice_readCnt + 1 WHERE notice_num= #{notice_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pj_notice_tbl (notice_num, user_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_readCnt, notice_date) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(notice_num)+1, 1) FROM pj_notice_tbl), #{user_id}, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, 0, sysdate)
